content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li

content: Hello, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is the price range you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Baihu Li

content: I understand, but I am sure you are aware that as a landlord, I am looking to get the highest rental price possible for my apartment. Is there a specific amount you have in mind that you think is fair for the 25 square meters of space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am open to any price.

Is it possible to negotiate the rental price?

Also, I am planning to stay in the apartment for one year.

TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li

content: I see, thank you for letting me know. I will keep that in mind during our negotiations. As a landlord, I am looking to get the best possible rental price for my apartment, so I am open to discussing the specifics with you. Would you be willing to share what you have in mind for the rent? Additionally, since you plan to stay in the apartment for one year, would you be willing to sign a one-year lease?
name: Heinrich Heine
